document.full_text: a swedish firm has become the first known foreign company to use russian positioning technology glonass, in a sign that the system could become a credible challenge to established u.s. rival gps.
document.title: swedish firm starts using russian satnav
lines_and_colors: a swedish firm has become the first known foreign company to use russian positioning technology glonass, in a sign that the system could become a credible challenge to established u.s. rival gps.
